attributes.action: uphold the decision of English Heritage to grant listed status to the Plymouth Civic Centre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Civic Centre, while not to everyones taste, is a landmark structure on the Plymouth skyline. It is just one of the many examples of postwar architecture which is under threat in the city, thanks to the blinkered attitiudes of the City Council. While Le Havre (the nearest French eqiuvalent) is a World Heritage Site, Plymouth is being turned into a building site and cash cow for developers.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "uphold the decision of English Heritage to grant listed status to the Plymouth Civic Centre."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13314.asp

Prime Minister's Office
